image.name: brainMask
image.label: Brain Mask
image.description: Brain mask. Image where for every voxel == 0 the tensors are not estimated.

image.name: badRegionMask
image.label: Bad Region Mask
image.description: Bad region mask. Image where for every voxel > 0 the tensors are not estimated.

image.name: thresholdMask
image.label: Threshold Mask
image.description: Bad region mask. Image where for every voxel > 0 the tensors are not estimated.

integer.name: threshold
integer.description: Baseline threshold for estimation. If not specified calculated using an OTSU threshold on the baseline image.

image.name: B0
image.label: Baseline Image
image.description: Baseline image, average of all baseline images.

image.name: IDWI
image.label: IDWI
image.description: idwi output image. Image with isotropic diffusion-weighted information = geometric mean of diffusion images.

integer.name: weightIterations
integer.description: Number of iterations to recaluate weightings from tensor estimate

double.name: stepSize
double.label: Step Size
double.description: Gradient descent step size (for nls and ml methods)
